modName: Merchants instantly restock items and gold
summary: Make restocking instant so merchants never run out of gold and have infinite items to sell as long as you have the money to buy them.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+1]
A very simple mod that changes the merchants restocking time to 0 so that merchants restock every time you buy/sell something from/to them.

Effects:
1. Merchants never run out of gold. You can dump everything you looted from an adventure to a merchant without worrying he doesn't have enough gold.
2. You can buy unlimited potions/ingots/soul gems/you name it from merchants so your gold is now more useful.

My other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54415]Soul Trap Redone[/url]
[/size]
author: hc65535
